html:
5.5.22  8:27 am   Would you change the title of "might quit" if you could?  If so, why?

      the only other title, which is the title it was originally supposed to have, is "it's the first day of school". the reason i changed it from that is because that sounds too much like a nursery rhyme, and the previous song i'd released already sounded too much like a nursery rhyme

5.5.22  5:36 am   what do you think i could i buy with 6 euros right now

      how about 6 croissants

5.5.22  12:12 am   i think i'm starting to not care about music. it's very scary because ever since i was a small child i've been playing instruments and it's always just been what i do, but recently i just don't seem to care anymore. i can't find any music i like

      just for a little while, see if there's anything visual you might be interested in

5.4.22  11:54 pm   I like the idea of philosophy but I'm not really liking this philosophy class I'm taking. Why is that?

      probably because most philosophy is outside of the classroom

5.4.22  9:54 pm   can you sing any good

      i'll try

5.4.22  9:31 pm   what's the seventeenth word of your next song

      you've

5.4.22  7:19 pm   whats the 999th word of the upcoming song

      i didn't count the words but i'm very sure that there are not that many words in it

5.4.22  6:26 pm   what tempo is the next song in worms 

      non-worm tempo

5.4.22  5:20 pm   should i go to sleep

      sure

5.4.22  4:29 pm   Does sitting in a bathtub filled with water turn me into soup

      maybe after 100 years

5.4.22  3:45 pm   Please explain to me a piece of music terminology that I would most likely never need to use if I were to make music.

      you got the wrong guy. that's precisely the kind of music terminology i don't care for

5.4.22  2:33 pm   Any tips to remember a nice sounding tune you've come up with in your head?

      the best way nowadays is probably to record it into voice memo device or app, which is probably standard on most phones. if you don't have any recording device of any kind, then you'd have to learn some kind of music notation

5.4.22  2:14 pm   Is your next song called "doing it now"? 

      no

5.4.22  1:59 pm   Why are we told not to look at the sun?

     because that will probably destroy your eyes, from the brightness

      Could it perhaps have secrets?

     yes

5.4.22  10:17 am   What's your stance on stop signs?

      sometimes i wonder where the start signs are

5.4.22  8:47 am   Is there significance in the magazine having 27 pages?

      it's a friendly amount

5.4.22  8:38 am   What is your favourite song you have made so far?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

5.4.22  8:10 am   how do you make your songs sound good?

      i'm not sure

5.4.22  4:17 am   Is a window (made of glass, with pane, transparent) that stretches down to the floor and is openable a door?

      as long as it opens enough to walk through it

5.4.22  1:27 am   do you think its essential to understand how things work to make them work better?

      sometimes yes, or sometimes you could sneak into the game with a fresh perspective

5.3.22  7:53 pm   what's the most bill wurtz song you've made?

      doing it now

5.3.22  1:17 pm   whats the 4th word of the upcoming song

      doesn't

5.3.22  12:14 pm   Do you sometimes feel that the world is both large and small at the same time?

      yes. then after some introspection i can sometimes conclude that it's a medium size

5.3.22  11:47 am   does you next song have calendars in it

      no

5.3.22  9:43 am   Do you think bringing sentient life into this horrible world is unethical?

      i doubt it

5.3.22  9:35 am   how to say goodbye

      impossible. it can't be done

5.3.22  1:44 am   what should i do about the inevitable heat death of the universe?

      nothing. it's been cancelled

5.2.22  10:34 pm   why is it bad to think of chords starting from the root note to the highest note?

      it all depends on whether you enjoy it

5.2.22  8:37 pm   i notice sometimes artists will have songs that make direct references to their other songs. do you have any ideas that do this? would you ever consider doing it?

      it's rare but it does happen

5.2.22  7:48 pm   What is a bucket?

      a holder for other buckets

5.2.22  7:42 pm   Difference between a window and a door?

      door goes down to the floor

5.2.22  3:52 pm   help gravity wont stop pulling me down

      ok i'll be right over

5.2.22  12:52 pm   a while back you recommended taping soft objects to the drum heads to muffle them, so i taped a sock to the outer 1 cm of my toms with scotch tape. i have no idea what i'm doing. is this ok or is this terrible?

      you can find out by seeing how it sounds, but, what you described seems exactly like what the professionals do

5.2.22  12:50 pm   Do you write songs with no particular order to what comes first?

      the only good way for me is to do it in order. there's no good way to do it out of order. so when i happen to have an idea seems to want to belong somewhere later, it's almost impossible to guarantee that it will actually fit when the time comes. And if the first idea i have is something in the middle, well, then it's a huge puzzle and there's no great way of solving that, but if that's all i have then i must solve to find the beginning and then once i have that then it goes in order

5.2.22  12:35 pm   will you create a 3d hyper-realistic model of yourself for one of your music videos?

      no

5.2.22  11:07 am   is there a possibility of Soap Tips: Part II?

      i was thinking soap tips was part 2 to "hi i'm steve"

5.2.22  10:43 am   I've noticed in a lot of your songs there's a line that goes along the lines of "one day being together or feeling complete" is that a coincidence or are those lines related?

      it's a nice sentiment. is it a coincidence that it's nice twice? maybe

5.2.22  10:01 am   Bill, how do you feel about me wanting to become a nurse?

     ok

      I'm not completely sure about it

     what else might you want to do

5.2.22  8:18 am   Why are days numbered?

      so you can tell them apart

5.2.22  6:15 am   what's your favorite dance move?

      making a good impression in society

5.2.22  3:52 am   Have you ever come up one of your songs while dreaming?

     yes

      Conversely, have you ever come up with a really good song in a dream, which you then frustratingly can't remember when you wake up?

     yes

5.2.22  1:42 am   what made you write Got to know whats going on

      that 1 line (the title line) was written from the feeling of wishing we all could know really how the world works. the rest of the song was written because that song was the one that got picked in the random number selection

5.1.22  11:41 pm   why are rhodes (or any electric piano type, wurlitzer, clav) so damn wonderful?

      you must be playing it well. those things sound useless on their own. the sound itself is totally plain. so if it's good, that's the player's fault

5.1.22  11:17 pm   Will the next music video have facecam footage?

     no

     And will it be released on a Tuesday?

     yes

5.1.22  10:09 pm   thoughts on every place in the world except Hoboken?

      Noboken

5.1.22  10:05 pm   why is 1 + 1 + 1 + 1 = 1?

      maybe if the numerals are all being overlayed onto the exact same space

5.1.22  9:42 pm   want to time travel to the future?

      i have no choice

5.1.22  7:56 pm   how do I know if I'm the cool/fun type of weird or just the bad type of weird?

      you get to decide

5.1.22  7:10 pm   i had a dream which was a song that you made that doesn't exist. does this mean something?

      it might mean that you wrote a song in your sleep

5.1.22  1:47 pm   what's the difference between a corner store and a regular store? or are corner stores just the same as regular stores?

      a corner store would be located at the intersection of 2 streets
